author: rubi1200
title: Ubuntu Discourse Connectivity Issues
text:
For a few days I have been getting 503 and 504 errors when connecting to the site.
Has anyone else noticed this?
Seems to happen mostly in the afternoon/evening about 4-6 pm UK time but sometimes also in the early morning.
Yes, it started happening when the forum moved over, I guess the existing setup is simply not handling the new load … but knowing IS usually monitors site performance closely I’d expect this to be fixed eventually
Yes, several times, looks like something is being restarted each time it happens.
… here in the UK it loads very slowly or fails to load. I have average to fast broadband here not sure why it does this, just thought would flag it up
see Ubuntu Discourse Connectivity Issues (was just opened minutes before you posted this )
Thanx yes it seems to be sketchy in the UK at the moment and since it is a recent site maybe it will speed up
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science
